title: Topic 002 Question 085
body: You have an Azure subscription named Subscription1 that contains virtual network named VNet1. VNet1 is in a resource group named RG1.
User named User1 has the following roles for Subscription1:
You need to ensure that User1 can assign the Reader role for VNet1 to other users.
options: Remove User1 from the Security Reader and Reader roles for Subscription1. Assign User1 the Contributor role for Subscription1.
Remove User1 from the Security Reader role for Subscription1. Assign User1 the Contributor role for RG1.
Assign User1 the Network Contributor role for VNet1.
Assign User1 the User Access Administrator role for VNet1.
